H0.text: Used in cooking, agar-agar is a gelatin made from what. Algae

H1.text: Used in cooking, agar-agar is a gelatin made from what. Fungi

H2.text: Used in cooking, agar-agar is a gelatin made from what. Carrageenan-producing Plants

H3.text: Used in cooking, agar-agar is a gelatin made from what. Seaweed

A4.text: Agar-agar is a jelly-like substance consisting of polysaccharides obtained from the cell walls of some species of red algae

A5.text: Agar is obtained from the cell walls of some species of red algae, primarily from the Gracilaria genus (Irish moss, ogonori) and the Gelidiaceae family (tengusa)
